channel.title: Machine Learning on Andy Cao
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Andy Cao

item.title: Project 3: Time Series Analysis
item.description: * Statistical Inference * Clustering Analysis * SARIMA / VAR / Holt-Winters * Random Forest / XGBoost * LSTM * SVR / GP / HA / MA

item.title: Project 2: Predicitng Customer Churn for a Mobile Phone Carrier
item.description: 1. Project Overview In this project, we will build a series of models to predict the probability of Customer Churn for a Mobile Phone Carrier. In the first part, we will conduct Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA). Here the Synthetic Minority Oversampling Technique (SMOTE) method is employed to address the imbalanced classification problem. Then we will develop customer churn prediction models based on (1) Logistic Regression, (2) Decision Tree, (3) Random Forest, (4) Adaboost, (5) Gradient Boosting Decision Trees (GBDT), and (6) Neural Network.

item.title: Project 1: Predict Real Estate Prices in Beijing
item.description: 1. Project Overview In this project, we will build a linear regression model to help people better understand the factors that can affect the price of a house in Beijing. The main sections of this article are: (1) Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA), (2) Developing Linear Regression model for predicting real estate price, and (3) Use that model to make predictions. The Pytyhon Notebook containing the complete model development process can be found at Google Drive.
